title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: Places
body: Places          At the time of Theodore Roosevelt's inauguration in 1901, Buffalo, NY was one of the great cities in the United States. More...         The building that stands at 641 Delaware Avenue is preserved today as the site of Theodore Roosevelt's 1901 inauguration. However, it has a long and colorful history as one of Buffalo's oldest homes. More...         The Buffalo Barracks - The TR Inaugural Site was originally built in 1840 as part of this U.S. military installation. Learn why Buffalo needed defending. More...
